name: Foundation
title: L'Oréal Paris Infaillible · Foundation · 220 Sand
description: L'Oréal Paris Foundation 220 Sand Fresh wear

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

usageInformation.usage: To perfectly cover your complexion, apply makeup to your forehead, nose, chin and cheeks. Next, apply foundation with a blender from the centre of your face outwards. Finally, blend well so that there are no lines.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Long-lasting foundation 24H.Texture: Fluid - Coverage: Total - Finish: Semi-matte. Formula enriched with moisturising hyaluronic acid, extreme hold that resists the vagaries of the day for perfect coverage, flawless, zero transfer. Lets the skin breathe, non-drying formula. All skin types.the new 24h* Infallible formula offers a perfect complexion, as if freshly made up, that resists all the vagaries of the day.the perfect combination of sebum-absorbing agents and moisturising agents guarantees matt, shine-free and comfortable skin all day long. The new Oxygen Technology formula offers an ugly, ultra-stretchy, easy-to-apply texture that is deposited in a homogeneous n-veil with adjustable coverage that lets the skin breathe. The skin is smooth, soft and comfortable without any material effect. The foundation does not transfer, its colour remains intact all day long. It protects against UV SPF 25) *Consumer test on 117 women
